description:
# Description

A classic wide-brimmed hat with a rugged charm, perfect for life on the open plains. Protects from the sun while adding a touch of cowboy style.

### Contributor

Sunflower Land is a community game built by a hundreds of developers and artists across the globe.
Come join us on [Github](https://github.com/sunflower-land/sunflower-land)
name: Cowboy Hat
